Package clientGUIControllers

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Login controller for a login GUI. This class is used to identify the user and redirect him to the appropriate next page. This class defines methods and variables for handling user login interactions, such as taking input from username and password text fields, handling button clicks, and displaying error messages. The class uses other classes such as UserController to set the received user details from DB, CommonActionsController to redirect the user to the appropriate next page. and WorkerEntityController to handle with worker with second role(RegisteredCustomer/subscriber).

    • subscriberComboBox_Pressed

      void subscriberComboBox_Pressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This class handles the actions that occur when buttons are pressed in the subscriber login via Ekt app. This method is called when the subscriber combo box is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered the combo box being pressed.

    • loginEKT_Pressed

      void loginEKT_Pressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the login process for a subscriber using the EKT app. Get the selected subscriber details fromDB.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered the EKT login button being pressed.

    • userFound

      public void userFound(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This class handles the actions that occur when a user is found.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered the user being found This method check if the user's status is Not_Approved, if the user is not approved, the user will be redirected to the home page of a user with no role otherwise the user will be redirected to the home page according to his role.

    • getSubscriber_userNamesArr

    • showView

      private void showView(boolean partA, boolean partB)
      Set visble/not visble buttons,labels,text fields according to login type. Sets the visibility of certain elements based on the values of the input parameters.
      Parameters:
      partA - boolean value that sets the visibility of loginViaUsernameAndPasswordBtn, loginEKT, and subscriberComboBox.
      partB - boolean value that sets the visibility of loginviaEktBtn, loginButton, password, username, usernameLabel, and passwordLabel.

    • setServerLoginManager

      public void setServerLoginManager(ILoginManager loginManager)
      This method sets property for property injection, set the login manager to the given ILoginManager object. It is used for property injection.
      Parameters:
      loginManager - - the ILoginManager object to be set as the login manager.
